title: Switching community channels feels laggy

labels.name: E:Desktop Performance Improvements MVP
labels.description: Tasks to improve performance and memory usage for MVP

milestone.title: 2.28.0 Beta
milestone.description:
## Messaging & Communities team 

**1. Continue to fix bugs and stabilise chat and communities functionality as top priority**
- includes any issues found during dogfooding

**2. Status Communities / Discord bridge**
- Ensure bridge works with token gated communities (e.g. permission is set at the community level that requires a token to be held to be a member of that community)
- Ensure bridge works with token gated channels
- On the Status Desktop side, individual messages from Discord are displayed as individual messages with Discord usernames

**3. Continue work on profile showcase**

**4. Ability to mark a token gated channel as 'hidden'**
- A token gated channel that's marked as 'hidden' is only visible to community members that have the requisite tokens to access this channel
- Design for this is completed

**5. Community encryption change to support KeycardPro/Status Web**
- Patryk on point, to work with Michelle and Cammellos

**6. Ability to select any Collectable that exists when setting up a Community permission**
- So communities aren't limited to just using collectables the community itself has minted
- Designs already done for this I think, this functionality was discussed with MichaelC last year

**7. Fix user flow bugs, better handle edgecases and other improvements**
- Ben to provide designs and links to all associated issues
- Banning / unbanning and kicking: graceful support of edgecases and improvements**




 

## Wallet Team

**1. Fixing bugs, stabilisation of existing functionality**
- 0.17 will be our 1st or 2nd public beta release, so squashing bugs is the top priority
- Includes fully testing Keycard on Windows and fixing any outstanding Windows Keycard issues

**2. Collectables - support graceful support of edgecases and improvements**
- Ben to provide designs and links to all associated issues

**3. Other wallet improvements and improved edgecase support**
- Ben to provide designs and links to all associated issues
- QR code display updates
- Showing user which permissions they loose when they remove an account
- flow for restart required  for JSON RPC change to take effect

**4. Finish improved 'saved accounts' functionality and 'share address' dialogue**

body:
# Bug Report

Opening this issue as a replacement of https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/12363, as it has wrong description.
There was an initial assumption that chat loading animation is missing here. But it wasn't correct. The delay is happening for already loaded channels. This is a performance issue, not a missing animation bug.

1. I found that removing these lines fixes the delay:
https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/blob/2d0047846739f076510378327ecbff85b05154f3/ui/app/AppLayouts/Chat/panels/UserListPanel.qml#L63-L70
https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/blob/2d0047846739f076510378327ecbff85b05154f3/ui/app/AppLayouts/Chat/panels/UserListPanel.qml#L76-L79

2. I tried to replace `ExpressionRole` with `FastExpressionRole`, but it didn't really help:
https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/pull/13299

## Steps to reproduce

1. Go to some big community, e.g. https://status.app/c/CxmACjEKDlRlc3QgQ29tbXVuaXR5Eg9PcGVuIGZvciBhbnlvbmUYrAEiByNGRjAwMDAqAgUJAw==#zQ3shnd55dNx9yTihuL6XMbmyM6UNjzU6jk77h5Js31jxcT5V
2. Start switching between channels, note a delay.

https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/assets/25482501/8fc16fb1-7d33-461c-8ffc-01937420be63
